name: Purge the Scourge
text: Objective: Defeat 3 Undead allies. Reward: Draw 2 cards.
prompt: A knight in full plate armor with a glowing green sword stands in a desolate, misty graveyard. He is surrounded by a horde of undead creatures, including skeletons with glowing green eyes, zombies, and a ghostly wraith. The ground is littered with bones and broken weapons. In the background are jagged, rocky spires and dead trees.

name: Trial of the Elements
text: Objective: Play 3 Elemental cards. Reward: Draw a card.
prompt: A shaman in ornate armor with glowing blue runes stands on a cliff overlooking a powerful elemental landscape. He holds a staff with a glowing blue crystal. The landscape is divided into four elemental quadrants. On the left, a stormy sea with lightning. In the center, a large waterfall with water elementals and air elementals. On the right, a volcano erupts with rivers of lava, and earth elementals are emerging from the ground.

name: Bounty: The Defias Kingpin
text: Objective: Return 2 enemy allies to hand. Reward: Equip Kingpin's Cutlass (2/2).
prompt: A powerful warrior in ornate, red and black plate armor with a menacing helmet and skull motifs is in a battle stance. He is holding a large, curved scimitar. He is using a magical ability that is pushing back a pirate and an orc, who are both being thrown backwards by a blast of white energy. The scene is set in a cobblestone street in a dark city, with a crowd of people and soldiers in the background.

name: Hunt the Great Kodo
text: Objective: Deal 10 damage with Beasts. Reward: Summon a 3/3 Kodo with Rush.
prompt: A massive, white-furred kodo beast with huge tusks is charging through a snowy, mountainous landscape. The kodo is wearing a leather harness. A group of hunters on horseback are surrounding and attacking the kodo with bows and arrows. The scene is action-packed, with snow flying and a dramatic, cloudy sky.

name: Forge the Relic
text: Objective: Play 3 Equipment cards. Reward: Draw a card.
prompt: A dwarven blacksmith with a long, braided beard is forging a glowing, magical sword on an anvil. He is in a dark, stone forge with a large furnace in the background. The forge is filled with tools, weapons, and armor. The blacksmith is holding a hammer and is surrounded by sparks and smoke.

name: Call to Arms
text: Objective: Control 3 units with Taunt for a turn. Reward: All allies gain +1/+1 this turn; draw a card.
prompt: A massive army of diverse fantasy races stands on a cliff's edge, ready for battle. In the foreground, a female elf archer takes aim, a dwarf warrior with a glowing axe stands ready, and a large minotaur warrior holds a shield. In the background, knights on horseback and foot soldiers with banners stand under a dramatic, cloudy sky with rays of light.
